com.tangosol.net
Interface Action

All Known Subinterfaces:
CacheService.CacheAction, Cluster.MemberTimeoutAction, PartitionedService.PartitionedAction, ProxyService.ProxyAction
public interface Action

An Action represents a controllable action or behavior that a Service might perform. Actions can be controlled by applying a ActionPolicy to the Service.

Since:
Coherence 3.6
Author:
rhl 2009.05.07
